channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Delete Every App On Your Smartphone That’s On This List

item.title: How To Play GameCube Classics In Full Widescreen Mode On Switch 2
item.description: Did you know that supported GameCube Classics can be played in full widescreen mode on Switch 2? Here's how to do it!
